settings.apphead: Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach Program by Dr. Ruth Roberts
settings.subappconhead: Become a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach to Guide Pet Owners Towards Holistic Health Solutions for Their Beloved Companions
settings.appdesc: The Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach Program by Dr. Ruth Roberts is a comprehensive training program designed for individuals who are interested in becoming Holistic Pet Health Coaches. The program provides students with the knowledge and skills necessary to guide pet owners in promoting their pets' total wellness and vitality through natural and holistic means.
settings.appcontctdes:
Certified Holistic Pet Health Coaches are trained professionals who specialize in providing guidance and support to pet owners in achieving optimal health and well-being for their pets using holistic, integrative veterinary approaches. These coaches have an understanding of the various factors that impact pet health, such as nutrition, exercise, emotional health, and environmental factors. 

By becoming a certified Holistic Pet Health Coach, you may provide your services in a variety of settings, including veterinary clinics, pet stores, animal shelters, or working one to one with pet parents. You may also offer a range of services, the science behind Functional Medicine, supporting dogs and cats with traditional veterinary care, developing food and supplement plans tailored to each cat and dog, and lifestyle coaching to help domestic animals thrive and live healthier, happier lives. Additionally, the program has received approval for 40 hours of RACE CE Credits  for Veterinarians and Vet techs through AAVSB.

Our comprehensive training program equips you with the knowledge and skills needed to succeed in this rewarding field. Join the growing demand for pet care professionals and start your career as a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach today!

settings.textdesc: Certified Holistic Pet Health Coaches are trained professionals who specialize in providing guidance and support to pet owners in achieving optimal health and well-being for their pets using holistic, integrative veterinary approaches. These coaches have an understanding of the various factors that impact pet health, such as nutrition, exercise, emotional health, and environmental factors.

You may also offer a range of services, the science behind Functional Medicine, supporting dogs and cats with traditional veterinary care, developing food and supplement plans tailored to each cat and dog, and lifestyle coaching to help domestic animals thrive and live healthier, happier lives. Additionally, the program has received approval for 40 hours of RACE CE Credits  for Veterinarians and Vet techs through AAVSB.
settings.textdesc3: Our comprehensive training program equips you with the knowledge and skills needed to succeed in this rewarding field. Join the growing demand for pet care professionals and start your career as a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach today!

settings.c_desc: We help you develop the knowledge and skills you need to provide effective and compassionate care for pets.
We can help you develop a unique niche in the field and differentiate yourself from other professionals.​
We support you through the program by offering weekly mentorship sessions over the duration of the program (16 weeks) with the mentor assigned to you by Dr.Ruth.
Network with other professionals in the field and build relationships that can help you grow your business and advance your career.
Help pets live healthier, happier lives, and provide owners with the guidance and support they need to make informed decisions about their pets' health.
As pet ownership continues to rise, so does the demand for qualified professionals who can offer holistic, integrative approaches to pet health.

settings.bworkdes: Fill out our application form and let us know why you’re a good fit for the program.
We will review your application and assess your qualifications and suitability for the program.
If your application is accepted, you'll have the opportunity to discuss your goals and motivations for becoming a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach.
After the interview, the team will notify you of your acceptance into the program.
You'll begin the coaching 16 sessions where you'll learn about a variety of topics related to pet health with Dr. Ruth Roberts
16  sessions with experienced professionals in the field for personalized guidance and support as you work towards completing the program.
After completing the coaching sessions, you'll take an exam to assess your understanding of the material covered in the program
Receive your certification as a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach and be recognized as a qualified professional in the field.

settings.cworksutext: The Path to Holistic Pet Health Coaching Certification
settings.cworkdessubhead: From application to graduation, our program offers a comprehensive journey towards becoming a certified holistic pet health coach. In this guide, we will walk you through each step of the process and provide an overview of what you can expect as you embark on this exciting career path

settings.afterdesc: After graduation, you'll have the opportunity to be listed on our consultants’ page and  join a network of other Certified Holistic Pet Health Coaches. This program connects certified holistic pet health coaches with potential clients who are seeking high-quality, personalized care for their dogs and cats. By joining the Dr. Ruth Referral Program, you'll be listed on a dedicated page, giving you exposure to a wide audience of pet owners who are actively seeking holistic wellness and primary care services for their pet.

We follow up with graduates on a weekly basis via live Q&A sessions run by Dr. Ruth. All graduates will have free access to the Q&A sessions for a year after graduation ensuring that graduates have ample time to take advantage of this resource and continue to refine their knowledge and skillsThe Q&A sessions are a great way for graduates of the program to stay connected and continue to learn and develop their skills as Certified Holistic Pet Health Coaches.

settings.programsubhead: Join Our Network of Certified Holistic Pet Health Coaches

settings.m_head: What Will You Learn:  Our Comprehensive Curriculum
settings.modulepare:
The key outcome of this program is to prepare you to become a compassionate and knowledgeable Holistic Pet Health Coach. You’re expected to master various modalities and resources we provide throughout the program. By the end of the program, you will gain the skills and knowledge necessary to provide comprehensive guidance and support to pet owners such as: determine the best healing protocol for each pet, create customized natural care wellness for dogs and cats, and empower pet owners to make informed decisions regarding their pet's health and wellness with natural methods and remedies.

You'll participate in two integration weeks, where you'll have the opportunity to practice your skills to develop your knowledge and understanding of holistic veterinary care. These integration weeks provide a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience in the field.  Our course curriculum includes the following modules:

settings.arrowhead: Module 1: Welcome to the Program + Pet Health Coaching Essentials
settings.arrowdes: This module will introduce you to the program and provide an overview of the skills and knowledge you'll need to become an effective Holistic Pet Health Coach.
In this module, you'll learn how to effectively market your business and attract new clients.
You'll learn about the innovative and integrative Ipets approach to pet health, which takes into account the whole pet, including physical, mental, and emotional health.
This module will cover the importance of nutrition in pet health, including how to create balanced and healthy diets for dogs and cats.
You'll learn about the gut microbiome and how it impacts overall pet health, including strategies for supporting a healthy gut.
This module will cover the role of the liver in pet health and how to support its function through nutrition and other holistic approaches.
You'll learn about the importance of kidney health in pets and how to support this vital organ through diet and other holistic approaches.
This module will cover the endocrine system and how it impacts cats and dogs health, including strategies for supporting healthy hormonal balance.
You'll learn about the business side of pet health coaching, including legal and financial considerations.
This module will cover common skin issues in pets and how to support healthy skin through nutrition and other holistic approaches.
You'll learn about the musculoskeletal system and how to support healthy bones, joints, and muscles in pets.
This module will cover the complex relationship between pet behavior and health, including strategies for addressing common behavioral issues.
You'll learn about the impact of cancer on pet health and how to support dogs and cats and their owners through diagnosis, treatment, and recovery.
This module will cover autoimmune diseases in pets and how to support pets through holistic approaches that address underlying immune dysfunction.

settings.testdes: Many Certified Holistic Pet Health Coaches work as independent contractors or run their own businesses, allowing them to set their own schedules and work from home. This flexibility can be particularly appealing for individuals who are looking for a career that offers work-life balance.

settings.cost_desc: Pay in full for $5000 (one-time fee). You will pay $5,000 all at once, then no additional payments will be required.
The program's total cost $6000. You will pay $1,500 admission fees, then $1,500 per month.
The program's total cost is $6005. You will pay $500 admission fees, then $367 per week.

custom_css: span {color: #184b44; font-family: "BLT-Heirloom"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 300; line-height: 40px; color: #184b44;}

settings.proo_des: The program fees for our certified holistic pet health coach program may seem like a significant investment, but it's important to remember that this is an investment in your future and the health of pets. Our flexible payment options make it easier for you to start your career without worrying about financial constraints. By becoming a certified holistic pet health coach, you'll be able to positively impact the lives of pets and their owners, while building a fulfilling and rewarding career. Don't hesitate to invest in yourself and the future of pet health - join our program today!

settings.confimedp: Dr. Ruth’s Pet Health Coaching program is well worth the time and energy to learn more about pets’ health requirements and their nutritional needs. As a holistic health coach for humans, I already knew some of the material. Still, she blew me away with detailed but understandable information of the body systems and the foods and supplements to address insufficiencies that lead to disease for both dogs and cats. Her knowledge and teaching of Traditional Chinese Veterinary Medicine is the perfect complement to address issues beyond what functional medicine teaches (also mind-blowing!). The information is presented thoughtfully, and, what I appreciate most, is Dr. Ruth’s personal time that she gives to each student, ensuring their understanding of the material and success in the program. If you are ready to improve your pet’s health – and possibly even your career – I highly recommend this program to both the engaged and motivated novice and the trained health professional!

settings.confimed: Dr. Ruth is an open book
settings.confimedp: Dr. Ruth Roberts’ Holistic Pet Health Coach program is a comprehensive and unique one - she shares her knowledge and experience as a vet of over 30 years, the holistic approach she found great success with and incorporates Traditional Chinese Veterinary Medicine for a truly integrative approach to health and wellness.I’ve really enjoyed this program - it provides an understanding of both the anatomy and physiology of our pets, encourages to figure out and address the root cause of issues (instead of masking symptoms) and teaches us how to create actionable steps to support our furry friends and clients by using a nutrient-dense, gently cooked diet, supplements, massage techniques and various other tools.Dr. Ruth is an open book, she provides proven, practical advice and her guidance and continuous support throughout and after the course is invaluable.I highly recommend this Holistic Pet Health Coaching program to health practitioners looking to expand their business, pet-enthusiasts looking for a rewarding career and any animal lover looking to support their own fur babies to live a long, happy and healthy life.

The Holistic Pet Health Coach Certification Program is a Great Course!If you want to help others and more importantly help your own fur family live longer, healthier and reduce your vet bills this course is for you. Not only can you begin a career in helping others but you can also apply your new knowledge to your human lifestyle for a healthier YOU!

settings.prevdes: My goal is to revolutionize pet care and change the way we approach animal health. With my expertise and compassionate approach, I am dedicated to helping all of my furry patients live their best lives.

settings.heading: The opportunity to become a professional pet Pet Health Coach has come very close to you

settings.faqdes:
One of the key benefits of our certification program is the opportunity to learn from Dr. Ruth's 30+ years of experience and knowledge in the field of integrative veterinary care. Dr. Ruth is a highly experienced practitioner who has helped thousands of pets achieve optimal health through natural methods and remedies. You'll have the chance to work directly with her and learn from her expertise, which is a unique and valuable opportunity.

During the program, you'll also learn how to develop lifestyle action plans and supplement plans that are tailored to each individual pet's needs. This includes working with pet parents harmoniously to ensure that their pets receive the best possible care and support.

Our certification program will teach you how to build a business that serves you and your clients. This includes a step-by-step guide to set up your coaching practice, market, and create the life you have always wanted.
settings.faqbtn: What will I learn from this certification?

settings.faqdes:
As a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach, you'll have a wide range of opportunities to help pets and their owners achieve optimal health and wellness. One of the primary ways you can work with clients is through one-on-one coaching, where you'll create customized wellness plans for each individual pet.

In addition to one-on-one coaching, you can also develop group coaching programs for puppies, kittens, seniors, and new pet parents, providing support and education to a wider audience.

Another way to expand your business as a holistic pet health coach is by hosting workshops and becoming a public speaker in the pet health industry, sharing your knowledge and expertise with a wider audience.

Other options include supporting local veterinary practices as an expert in home-cooked pet nutrition, hosting podcasts, YouTube channels, or other media, and even becoming an influencer in the pet health community. With your certification, you can start exciting programs in your community and make a difference in the lives of pets and their owners.
settings.faqbtn: What can I do as a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach?

settings.faqdes:
Our coaching program includes a weekly session with a mentor assigned to you by Dr. Ruth. The first two mentorship calls are designated for onboarding and the additional 14 sessions will be mainly for you to discuss any topic or concern related to the coaching program with your mentor. Our one-to-one mentorship offers personalized coaching and guidance to help you achieve your goals and grow as a practitioner.

During our one-to-one mentorship sessions, you'll work directly with a mentor assigned to you by Dr. Ruth to develop your skills. Whether you're a new practitioner looking to build your skills and knowledge, or an experienced vet seeking to expand your practice into the world of holistic veterinary care, our one-to-one mentorship program can help.

What are the Q&A Weekly sessions?

The live Q&A sessions with Dr. Ruth provide a valuable opportunity for graduates to ask questions, receive guidance, and stay up-to-date on the latest developments in the field of holistic pet health. These sessions are provided by Dr. Ruth on a weekly basis and access will be offered to graduates for free for a full year after graduation. After one year, access will be granted to graduates who will subscribe to our Q&A sessions.

As a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach, you have a wide range of career options available to you. Some of the things you can do include:
1.Coach clients 1-on-1: Work with pet owners to develop personalized holistic health plans for their pets.
2.Group coaching programs: Offer group coaching programs for puppies, kittens, seniors, and new pet parents to help them learn about holistic veterinary care care.
3.Group cooking classes: Host group cooking classes using The Original CrockPet Diet to teach pet owners how to prepare healthy, homemade meals for their pets.
4.Make and sell pet food: Create and sell The Original CrockPet Diet food made for individual pets, which can be a great source of income.
5.E-commerce supplement business: Create an e-commerce business selling supplements for pets.
6.Online coaching programs: Develop and run online evergreen coaching programs to help pet owners learn about holistic veterinary  care.
7.Workshops: Host workshops to teach pet owners the basics of a holistic pet lifestyle, including nutrition, exercise, and stress management.
8.Public speaking: Become a public speaker in the pet health industry, sharing your knowledge and expertise with others.
9.Media and Television: Become an expert in homecooked pet nutrition and provide support to local veterinary practices. You can also host podcasts, YouTube channels, or other media to reach a wider audience.
10.Influencer: Build a following on social media and become an influencer in the pet health industry.
11.Community Programs: Start exciting programs in your community, such as volunteering at animal shelters, hosting pet health fairs, or working with local pet stores to promote holistic veterinary care.
settings.faqbtn: What can I do as a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach?
